In a class of its own, this spectacular residence's unforgettable newly renovated indoor and outdoor dimensions establish a new benchmark in design and luxury. Positioned perfectly in a prized and private gated community just meters from the Sandhurst Clubhouse, golf course and beautiful lakes.
With a brilliantly designed floorplan providing light airy spaces that flow effortlessly throughout the home. Enter through the grand double doors to a fabulous study to your right, next you will find the fabulous formal lounge or theatre room with a projector ready for movie nights. Opposite you will find a lovely 5th bedroom complimented by a powder room, ideal for guests, in laws or those running a business from home. Walking through to the rear of the home is the impressive and modern kitchen incl. beautiful matt black cabinetry, stone benchtop with integrated appliances, (X2 600mm Bosch pyrolytic ovens, gas cooktop, matching matt black tapware) and cupboards galore! This zone overlooks the breakfast bar, dining and large living room with feature (bio-ethanol fire place) all leading out to the oversized timber decked alfresco/BBQ/firepit entertainment area. Downstairs is finished off with beautiful low maintenance gardens, grassed area for kids and pets to play, internal entry to the double remote garage as well as rear roller door access, with parking bay behind double gates perfect for trailers, van or boat.
Upstairs won't disappoint! This quality built home enjoys a large upstairs living space, 3 wonderful bedrooms all with BIRs and serviced by the centrally located bathroom with a to-die-for standalone deep tub and under floor heating. The generous master opens to a huge peaceful space, with walk in robes, while the ensuite provides a luxury spa, double vanity and separate toilet. This area opens onto a huge balcony providing glorious views of the enviable street.
With other features such as: WiFi controlled smart switches (downstairs), LED pendant lighting, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, new carpets, ducted vacuum system, stunning floating timber floors throughout, great functional laundry and so much more.
Residents facilities and services include a Health Club with pool, the Member's Clubhouse with dining, as well as bar and casual facilities, parks, re-cycled water and kilometers of walking tracks. Viewing is a must to appreciate this beautiful family home.
